Entries.default:
Loose masonry mars the southern wall of the gatehouse. Some of the protruding bricks look prominent enough to climb. 

Yet the stonework feels slick with sea spray and slime moss. You estimate a difficult climb. 

And a dangerous fall.
[Climb the tower.]
[Toss a grappling hook to the top of the wall.]
[Leave.]
"I don't suppose that will be especially quiet." Aloth scans the walkway around you and the eerily still water behind you.
"That's gonna clang real hard when it hits," Edér says.

"Captain, I can think of two ways to draw unnecessary attention. This is the worst one." 

Maia observes your preparations with a hand raised in caution.
"Wait. Unless these snakes are hard of hearing, they're going to hear that hook halfway across Hasongo."

"Oi, cap. Metal hook. Stone wall. You be looking to catch every eye and ear on watch?"

Serafen shakes his head.

"A noisy disturbance, I say. Is there not a quieter grappling hook among your gear?" 

Tekēhu tips his head and smiles.
"Careful. Any noise could draw unwanted attention," Xoti says.
As you swing the grapple, you realize that the hook will probably make some noise.
[Toss the grappling hook.]

The grappling hook lands with a loud clang.

No sooner have you pulled it tight than you hear splashing and hissing behind you.

The grappling hook lands with a loud clang. 

You look around, but you don't see any cause for alarm.
You give the rope a quick tug to secure it and climb up.
Your rope dangles over the side of the wall. The grapple is still firmly attached.
[Climb down the rope.]
You descend to the base of the tower.
A rope dangles from the top of the gatehouse. It feels secure.
[Climb the rope.]
You ascend quickly and easily to the top of the tower.

Loose masonry mars the southern wall of the gatehouse. Some of the protruding bricks look prominent enough to climb. 

Yet the stonework feels slick with sea spray and slime moss. You estimate a difficult climb. 

And a dangerous fall.
You ascend quickly and easily to the top of the tower.

You're halfway up when your feet slip out from under you.

You kick around for a foothold as you try to maintain a grip on the jagged stone above you.

Unfortunately, your strength gives out. Your hands slip from the wall, and you land at the base of the tower with a sharp pain in your ankle.

You're halfway up when you hear a gasp below.

Looking down, you see [SkillCheck 0] holding feebly to a jagged stone, his feet dangling over open air. 

As you watch, his hands slip from the stone, and he lands at the base of the tower with a pained yelp.

You have no choice but to climb back down after him.

You're halfway up when you hear a gasp below.

Looking down, you see [SkillCheck 0] holding feebly to a jagged stone, her feet dangling over open air. 

As you watch, her hands slip from the stone, and she lands at the base of the tower with a pained yelp.

You have no choice but to climb back down after her.
[Climb down the tower.]
[Use a grappling hook to climb down.]
You descend to the base of the tower.

You're halfway down when your feet slip out from under you.

You kick around for a foothold as you try to maintain a grip on the jagged stone above you.

Unfortunately, your strength gives out. Your hands slip from the wall, and you land at the base of the tower with a sharp pain in your ankle.

You're halfway up when you hear a gasp above.

Looking up, you see [SkillCheck 0] holding feebly to a jagged stone, his feet dangling over open air. 

As you watch, his hands slip from the stone, and he falls past you to land at the base of the tower with a pained yelp.

You're halfway up when you hear a gasp above.

Looking up, you see [SkillCheck 0] holding feebly to a jagged stone, her feet dangling over open air. 

As you watch, her hands slip from the stone, and she falls past you to land at the base of the tower with a pained yelp.
You secure your grappling hook under the lip of the wall and climb easily down.
You ascend quickly and easily to the top of the tower.
You descend to the base of the tower.
